channel.title: Conversations from the Pale Blue Dot
channel.description: Conversations from the Pale Blue Dot is an interfaith interview show, featuring experts from all religions and worldviews, but focusing on the divide between Christianity and atheism.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Discussions on ethics, religion, and naturalism.
channel.itunes:author: Luke Muehlhauser
channel.itunes:summary: Conversations from the Pale Blue Dot is an interfaith interview show, featuring experts from all religions and worldviews, but focusing on the divide between Christianity and atheism.

item.title: 040: Luke Barnes - 11 Responses to Fine-Tuning
item.itunes:author: lukeprog
item.description: In one of my funniest and most useful episodes yet, I interview astronomer Luke Barnes about the plausibility of 11 responses to the fine-tuning of the universe. Frankly, once you listen to this episode you will be better equipped to discuss fine-tuning than 90% of the people who discuss it on the internet.
item.itunes:summary: In one of my funniest and most useful episodes yet, I interview astronomer Luke Barnes about the plausibility of 11 responses to the fine-tuning of the universe. item.title: 001: Robert Russell - God and Physics
item.itunes:author: lukeprog
item.description: In the first episode of my new interfaith podcast, I tell my own deconversion story, interview Robert Russell (founder of the Center for Theology and the Natural Sciences), and answer my first listener question: "What is atheism?"
